title: Effect of war and totalitarianism on art 1900-1950

content.question:
Write an essay that:

Has a relevant thesis.

Addresses all parts of the question.

Supports thesis with specific evidence.

Is well organized.

Analyze how warfare and the rise of totalitarian regimes affected the development of the arts in Europe during the first half of the 1900s.

frqParts.text:
Write an essay that:

Has a relevant thesis.

Addresses all parts of the question.

Supports thesis with specific evidence.

Is well organized.

Analyze how warfare and the rise of totalitarian regimes affected the development of the arts in Europe during the first half of the 1900s.

skill.text: Skill 4.A: Identify and describe a historical context for a specific historical development or process.
